articles.title: Activist investor Elliott Management demands shake-up of GlaxoSmithKline board - The Times
articles.description: An American hedge fund has called on GlaxoSmithKline to consider an overhaul of its board and a sale of its consumer healthcare business.In an open letter to Sir Jonathan Symonds, the British drugs

An American hedge fund has called on GlaxoSmithKline to consider an overhaul of its board and a sale of its consumer healthcare business.
